Data presentation.

```{r Filtering Data for Carriage}
Carriage_heating_oil <- table_heating_oil_case_study |>
  filter(Building == "Carriage") |>
  mutate()

Carriage_electricity <- table_electricity_case_study |>
  filter(Building == "Carriage  House") |>
  mutate()
  
```

```{r}
Carriage_heating_oil |>
  ggplot()+
  geom_line(aes(x = `Delivery Date`, y = Gallons))

Carriage_electricity |>
  ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(x = Date, y = KWH))
  
```



```{r, eval=FALSE}
  ggplot() +
  geom_line(Carriage_heating_oil, mapping = aes(x = `Delivery Date`, y = Gallons)) + 
  geom_line(Carriage_electricity, mapping = aes(x = Date, y = KWH))
```
